scenario_text.value:
To think I couldn’t tell the fake from the
real Labramon. I’m the worst...

What do you expect? It looked exactly the
same.

I don’t want to make the same mistake again.
Labramon is so important to me.
Of course, I’ll help you however I can.

Is there any way to tell the real Labramon
apart from a fake, I wonder?
